title: Understand the Axes
text: Look closely at the axes of each graph. Think about the range of x-values and y-values given in the data points. Which graph's axes seem to match these data points?

title: Plot the Points
text: Try sketching points for the data given: $$(16,46)$$, $$(18,50)$$, $$(20,54)$$, $$(25,55)$$, and $$(30,62)$$. Where would these points fit best among the graphs shown?

title: Look for Patterns
text: Observe if there is a trend in the data points. Are they increasing or decreasing? Which graph reflects this pattern?

title: Analyze Graph A
text: Does Graph A have a scale on the $$x$$ and $$y$$ axis that matches the data points? What would you expect the plot to look like?
